alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nova Southeastern University, or near Davie, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Lauderhill, Oakland Park, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Wilton Manors, Lazy Lake, Ravenswood Estates, St. George, Estates Of Fort Lauderdale, Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport, Chambers Estates, Pine Island Ridge and Port Everglades. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County
